title: Namibia: Nandi-Ndaitwah Calls for Private Sector to Address High Unemployment
description:
Namibia continues to grapple with persistent threats of unemployment, poverty and inequality, undermining human dignity and threatening social security.

This was highlighted by president Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwah at the launch of the Namibia Public-Private Forum yesterday.
